title: You can only get one project skin blueprint?
body: Is it true that you can only get one project skin blueprint (from disruption icon case)? Since you can only get 1 case does that mean you cant get another project skin blueprint? Augment cache wont give you any project skin blueprint?

replies.body:
This is correct. The Disruption cache will give you a random PROJECT skin shard, which is unique to this cache. If you intend to participate in the event without spending RP, then yes, you can only potentially get one PROJECT skin shard. 

Our [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) has the complete deets if you need them. Let me know if you have any questions.
